title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 12 January 2013 - XWiki
content:
has quit 00:06  has quit 00:13  has joined #xwiki 00:13  has quit 00:23  has joined #xwiki 00:37  has joined #xwiki 00:47  has quit 00:55  has quit 01:07  has quit 01:08  has joined #xwiki 01:14  has joined #xwiki 01:14  has joined #xwiki 01:19  has quit 01:28  has quit 01:46  has quit 01:52  has joined #xwiki 02:14  has quit 02:14  has joined #xwiki 02:15  has joined #xwiki 02:18  has quit 02:19  has quit 02:48  has joined #xwiki 02:49  has joined #xwiki 03:15  has joined #xwiki 03:19  has quit 03:33  has joined #xwiki 04:01  has quit 04:03  has joined #xwiki 04:50  has joined #xwiki 05:11  has joined #xwiki 05:16  has quit 05:42  has joined #xwiki 05:47  has quit 06:43  has joined #xwiki 06:47  has quit 07:14  has quit 07:43  has joined #xwiki 07:48  has quit 08:06  has quit 08:44  has joined #xwiki 08:49  has quit 09:27  has joined #xwiki 10:35  has joined #xwiki 11:25  has joined #xwiki 11:52  mflorea: fun, the javadoc for XWikiSyntaxEscapeWikiPrinter says: 11:52  For example if we have "\*\*" as special symbols (and not as a Bold Format block) we need to escape them to "~\*~\*" 11:53  ;) 11:53  so it escaped both for list and bold? 11:57  don't know yet 11:57  ok :) 11:57  haven't had the time to read the code yet 11:57  but the problem is probably in XWikiSyntaxEscapeWikiPrinter or in the calls to it 12:03  mflorea: escape2.test is almost the same 12:04  ah but it only checks the output for xhtml not as input 12:04  ah no my bad it does use html input 12:04  

\*\*notbold\*\*
##nomono##
//noitalic//
--notrike--
\_\_nounderscore\_\_
^^nosuper^^
,,nosub,,
{{{notverbatim}}}
(((nogroup)))

12:04  sure, the space between \*\* and text is important 12:04  generates ~\*~\*notbold~\*~\* in xwiki syntax 12:04  indeed 13:30  has joined #xwiki 13:46  has quit 13:54  has joined #xwiki 13:55  has quit 14:04  has joined #xwiki 14:20  has joined #xwiki 14:46  has quit 14:58  has joined #xwiki 14:59  has joined #xwiki 15:52  has quit 15:58  has joined #xwiki 16:07  has quit 16:15  has quit 16:17  has joined #xwiki 16:24  has quit 16:32  has joined #xwiki 16:43  has quit 16:57  has quit 17:06  has joined #xwiki 19:05  has quit 19:08  has quit 19:14  has joined #xwiki 19:25  has joined #xwiki 20:06  has quit 21:10  has joined #xwiki 21:25  has quit 22:11  has quit 22:18  has quit 23:43  has quit
